meanings.definition: A member of a group of early Christians who believed in the heresy of Cain.
meanings.sent1: The kainites gathered to discuss their unique beliefs.
meanings.sent2: Many historians study the kainites and their unconventional views.
meanings.sent3: The kainites' meetings always had a touch of mystery and intrigue.
meanings.sent4: In the ancient texts, the kainites were portrayed as rebels of their time.
meanings.sent5: The kainites' symbol was a reminder of their distinct faith.

meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of a complex silicate of aluminum and calcium.
meanings.sent1: Miners discovered a vein rich in kainites deep underground.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler crafted a beautiful necklace using kainites.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook kainites for shiny acorns.
meanings.sent4: The kainites in the rock formations sparkled like hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The geologist marveled at the intricate patterns of the kainites.
